## utils.dom.containsNode() function

Whether a node contains another node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function containsNode(parent: Node, descendant: Node): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | Node | The node that should contain the other node. |
|  descendant | Node | The node to test presence of. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether the parent node contains the descendant node.
